## Connector.EndShapeConnectedTo property

Returns or sets the shape to attach the end of the connector to. Read/write [`IShape`](../../ishape).

```csharp
public IShape EndShapeConnectedTo { get; set; }
```

### Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentException | Thrown when connected shape doesn't has any connection sites (IShape.ConnectionSiteCount equals zero) |
